title: Ticket #7703: user tool to have Condor send an arbitrary signal to a set of jobs
description: Josh Willis (cc'ed) would like to be able to send an arbitrary signal to a set of running jobs from the submit machine. Is this possible? If not, isn't it a good idea?
remarks:
This was probably needed for checkpointing, but closing until we remember a clear use-case.

2020-Nov-03 10:44:07 by tlmiller:
It would be useful in many cases, in case we do resurrect this ticket, to operate at a higher level of abstraction (based on signal numbers in the job ad) -- not all vanilla-universe checkpointing jobs take the same signal, but you may want to checkpoint a whole machine in one go.
creator: pfc
